compliant.legal provisions: The collection of IP addresses is necessary for the provision of services and is conducted in accordance with the principles of necessity and proportionality.

non_compliant.section: 使用網際網路協定以進行通訊
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy does not specify how the collected IP addresses will be used, stored, or shared, which is required under the transparency principle.
non_compliant.amend: Include a clear explanation of the purposes for which IP addresses are collected, how they will be used, and any third parties with whom they may be shared.
